places.name: Charminar
places.description: A grand monument with four towering minarets, built in 1591 by Muhammad Quli Qutb Shah.

places.name: Golconda Fort
places.description: A historic fort known for its impressive architecture and acoustic system.

places.name: Salar Jung Museum
places.description: One of the largest museums in India, housing a vast collection of art and artifacts.

places.name: Birla Mandir
places.description: A beautiful temple dedicated to Lord Venkateswara, built with white marble.

places.name: Lumbini Park
places.description: A beautiful park along the Hussain Sagar lake, known for its musical fountain show.

places.name: Ramoji Film City
places.description: One of the largest film studios in the world, offering various entertainment activities.

places.name: ISBT Uppal Bus Stop
places.description: A major inter-state bus terminal in Hyderabad.

places.name: Gandhi Bhavan
places.description: A museum dedicated to Mahatma Gandhi, showcasing his life and works.
